mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM word_user_role_relation ur LEFT JOIN word_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN word_role_permission_relation rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN word_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} AND p.id IS NOT NULL AND p.id NOT IN ( SELECT p.id FROM word_user_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN word_permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = - 1 AND pr.user_id = #{id} ) UNION SELECT p.* FROM word_user_permission_relation pr LEFT JOIN word_permission p ON pr.permission_id = p.id WHERE pr.type = 1 AND pr.user_id = #{id}
